topic.title: Unable to see search bar on Hello Zeronet
topic.body:
Is there a way to get the search bar to be consistent on Hello Zeronet? It seems to only show when you have stuff in your news feed like this photo: https://thetinhat.com/tutorials/images/zeronet-interface.jpg

When there's nothing in the news feed then it looks like this: https://bluishcoder.co.nz/images/zeronet1.png

1530568658_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: If you add new sites to the list are they automatically updated for me or do I have to visit the site to accept the changes?

1531057018_1EXv9ZukJjnSeYBijEBwFZZNBdEzE.body: I guess I still don't understand. On the left hand side under "Connected Sites" I have about 100 sites i'm seeding. If I understand correctly once one of those sites displays a notification in my feed all the sites become connected sites?  Is there a way for me to put something fake in my feed to activate the search bar for when I need it? The pictures above are ones I found on google cause i'm not sure how to upload images here.
